DIY: ironing for men, basic rule: forget about getting a good result. You are playing in defence, keep calm and try not to ruin anything. Keep in mind that even if you spend an hour on a shirt, this doesn't mean that you are getting a good result: when you turn around you shirt, you will be disappointed again!

I broke my first screw head when I was a kid, maybe 15 yo or so. I felt quite stupid, helpless and I poured out all my wrath on that freaking screw destroying it. 
But I quickly learn from my mistakes so then I disassembled hundreds of electronic devices, desktops and laptops with no problem.
And then I bought the most expensive gadget in my life: a macbook pro.
I enjoyed it for some years then one day I decided to open it and do some maintenance.
That day the freaking screw with the broken head was there, waiting for me in oder to take its revenge 15 years later... yes, screws are like elephants!!
mi viene il voppo!
